186017665.review: Mí primer juego de lego, lo quiero

186004110.review:
Things I Like: 
+++ Couch Coop! You can nearly always count on a Lego game to let you share the fun with another pal and I have to champion that because most companies these days want you to break the bank buying another console AND the game again. 
+++ Free-roam in a Lego city! Here you get to play around in New York with a bunch of famous buildings and Marvel buildings dotted around. See a Lego Liberty Statue, climb the Empire State Building or skydive from Stark Tower! The city feels vast and populated. There's plenty to do in the form of puzzles, races, bonus missions and mini-boss battles. This is where me and my sis have had the most fun, the most laughs and the most rewards. 
+++ Tons of characters both good guys and baddies. Lots of obscure characters that make me say "Who the Fuck is that?" out loud lol. Some have more than one appearance or can transform (Spiderman to Peter Parker for example) Plenty of custom character slots too. 
++ Many land vehicles, some air vehicles and two sea vehicles, some with two seats for you and your co-op pal. 
++ Creating a custom hero with more than one power. I mixed Spiderman with Captain America. So I got his shield but I can websling around too. 

Things I Dislike: 
--- The game's original story: I could not give a shit about these story missions. Purposely designed for more than one playthrough, they feel like a waste of time compared to the fun and rewards in Free-roam. 
--- The hero creator is a fantastic idea, but the options are very very limited. You cant use all the parts from all the characters you have. It's primarily the main cast. And it seems like it's limited to having just two powers at a time. 
-- Dynamic split-screen cam doing us absolutely no favours when aiming, racing, or just walking around story missions. It's very annoying. 
-- Weak writing, which is expected. But some weak punchlines too. Also, Nick Fury has never once said 'thang' instead of 'thing'. And he wont ever say it in the future either. That's some weird writing you put in there because it's Sam L's character and he's black. Jack-asses. 
-- Despite having a talented cast of voice actors, the acting isn't that great. Granted the writing isn't that great either, but I was able to guess a few of the actors before I looked up the list and you can hear them through multiple characters. 
- Repeated songs. There are tons of races and mini-games and you'll hear the exact same song repeating every time. Drives me nuts. Also I've heard that low-quality soundbite of Stan Lee saying 'Excelsior!' way too many times. Plays after every mission. Just shut up already. 
- Air vehicle/flying/climbing controls suck. It's better in races to just ignore the boost ability. Spiderman cant actually climb up walls (you know, like a spider can!) you have to webswing circles around your target to climb. 
- This one's more of a joke but I hate Mr Fantastic. His stretchy skin power is disgusting and I hate that he's one of the main characters.

185729719.review:
Este juego aunque tiene un mundo abierto con bastantes misiones que procede a ser algo innecesariamente repetitivo sin incentivos para seguir aparte de un “coleccionar todo” desaprovechando tantos héroes sin agregarles alguna mecánica o misión especial para ellos así que en esta reseña resalta algunas partes de este juego que me gusto y que no 

[h3]Personajes[/h3]
Encontraremos muchos personajes agradables para amantes  de los comics muy bien creados inclusive con skins que nos traerán recuerdos de pelis/comics/series, aunque resultan totalmente inútiles, por aunque tengas tantos personajes ocurrirán 2 cosas
-Son un copia y pega de otro en habilidades y solo cambia el diseño
-Usarás no más de 12-15 personajes para lograr el 100% de la aventura
aunque algunos personajes tienen animaciones únicas realmente divertidas se deja muy abandonado a todo el gran catálogo restante siendo solo un muñeco para coleccionar sin utilidad.
[i]Debo aclarar que aunque el juego tenga dlcs son totalmente opcionales siendo personajes y skins que solo deberías comprar si eres muy fan y quieres coleccionar [/i]

[h3]Doblaje/Traducción[/h3]
Es  [b]MALISIMO[/b] la mayoría de los actores parece que hablan sin ganas o sin comprender como es el personaje realmente, frases totalmente innecesarias o sin sentido durante el juego que ni siquiera un niño le podría causar gracia,Los chistes de este juego son diversos tanto para grandes como para niños, aunque la mayoría  parecen muy forzados aun teniendo un público mayormente infantil no todo causara gracia y no todo personaje sera chistoso
El problema de la [b]traducción[/b]  me resulta aún más absurdo, podrían dejar todos los nombres en inglés o traducir todos pero nos encontramos con una variedad muy amplia y unas traducciones innecesarias  y insultantes teniendo de ejemplo a [b]Carnage y Rocket[/b] que dentro del juego se llaman [b]Masacre y Mapache cohete[/b] sinceramente hubiera preferido tener todos los nombres en inglés, y otro problema que encuentro es que están en ambos idiomas teniendo de ejemplo a “Hombre araña y Spiderwoman” lo cual me pregunto por qué no poner Mujer araña no.?


[h3]Dificultad[/h3]
En lo que ami respecta el juego esta muy desbalanceado en combates sea por problemas de cámara y no lograr dar proyectiles/láser  o el hiper stun que tienen los enemigos con poderes, resultando muy molesto que por recibir un golpe te hagan un stun con la posibilidad de que si te encuentras con varios enemigos con poderes no podrás moverte hasta morir teniendo un CD muy corto entre sus habilidades lo cual un niño le puede resultar frustrante aunque se debe tener en cuenta que algunos personajes con fuerza puede matar de un golpe a los enemigos.
Por lo demás el juego es lego siempre serán sencillos para niños aunque a veces se debe buscar o pensar y no te dirán directamente donde o como hacerlo lo cual se agradece que sean intuitivos. 
 [i] Debo aclarar también que algunas misiones son mal expresadas o mal marcadas y puedes pasar bastante tiempo buscando[/i]

[h3]100%[/h3]
Fue una experiencia, no fue difícil y tampoco tarde mucho en lo que respecta a un lego, mi queja es tantos personajes y usaras a tan pocos teniendo la oportunidad de exprimir héroes y no lo hacen, muchas misiones iguales y innecesarias más que coleccionar por que los autos personalizados que obtenemos realmente no aportan nada ya que puedes literalmente ganar cualquier carrera con cualquier vehículo y podremos ir a todos los sitios volando siendo mucho más rápido y efectivo,
Las misiones nos dan ladrillos dorados que teniendo X ladrillos desbloqueamos unos minis capítulo mision donde veremos algo más de historia y héroes/villanos que luego obtendremos, tampoco está mal y tiene algo de motivacion para hacer 100% pero no encuentro mucho más para seguir  debido a que no te aporta nada, en cuanto consigues 2 multiplicadores las monedas quedan innecesarias como siempre y eso jamas a sido un problema en lego.
[i]Me gustaría dar mención especial de las odiosas misiones de salto sobre “sapo” mal diseñadas  tanto en camara salto y bugs que tiene y hablando de bug yo e jugado rescatando a 8 stan lee de mundo abierto sin poder verlos así que tuve problemas para encontrarlos aunque me los marcará en el mapa[/i]

185701329.review: I first played this game as a kid on my xbox 360, then again on my ps4 and now again on my pc. All 3 times I've 100% the game, this most recent playthrough hit me the hardest. I realised that I am no longer a kid and the fun I used to have has changed. I no longer feel the urge to race the trains as Iron Man, or swing around the city as Spider Man. I'm an adult now, everything is results driven now, if i'm not making progress I feel as if I'm wasting time. But playing this game as ab adult isn't all bad, I've learn't to love and respect the music, story, map design, animation and art style of the game. The game hasn't changed... I have.

185699250.review: This is honestly one of the best, if not the best, LEGO games out there. While the story might be on the shorter side, it’s the perfect game to enjoy on a relaxing afternoon. I played it a lot when I was younger, so revisiting it brought back some great memories—it felt amazing to experience it all over again.

185652613.review:
A cool collection of heroes, a neat little open world, and an overall fun time. That being said, I feel like it gets repetitive playing as the same group of 10 characters over and over rather than introducing just a couple more groups of heroes. No hell's kitchen / daredevil level? No missions including ghost rider, Punisher, Vision, Namor, falcon,Luke Cage, the Inhumans, etc.

Super Heroes 2 improves on this aspect a lot, but it just gets tiring playing as The Avengers or the F4 with Storm and Cyclops tagging along sometimes.

Классическая LEGO игра, основанная на комиксах Marvel в целом. Отсутствие конкретного фильма в качестве базы привела к сюжету, представляющую собой слабо связанный парад всех героев и злодеев вымышленной вселенной. Приевшийся геймплей и однообразная структура миссий помешал пройти игру большими кусками, запускал ровно на 1 миссию в день.

Тем не менее, игра оставила приятное впечатление, на Steam Deck идет отлично. 7.5/10

184902697.review:
This game was my childhood. Even though I only have 44 hours on THIS account, as a kid, I would play this game for days on my dad's steam profile before I had my own. Overall, I have about 700 hours on this game.

I won't sit here and pretend the game is perfect, because it isn't. Inherently, not everyone is going to like LEGO games, because they all follow the same basic gameplay with the occasional variation in the formula, but LMSH does almost everything a LEGO game can do, and it does it all very well. The game has a fantastic original story, pulling characters from the Avengers, the X-Men, and the Fantastic 4 all in one surprisingly well-written story that doesn't take too long to complete. The 15 chapters the game offers are more than enough to satiate any avid player's desire for character interactions you didn't even know you needed, like when Captain America and The Thing have to raid an island that has been taken over by velociraptors.

Now, I feel like I should mention the largest complaint people seem to have about this game; the Steam version of this game is an awful port to PC. There isn't any mouse support for the game, meaning you either have to connect a controller or play keyboard only, and it suffers from framerate issues occasionally and lots of screen tearing when playing with 2 monitors. These aren't issues on other versions of the game, such as the Xbox 360 version that was released at the same time, but without access to said other versions, I have found no major quality dips that impede on the primary gameplay. I would heavily recommend digging out an old wired Xbox controller and playing this game on that, though. Keyboard kinda sucks.

I briefly mentioned the story and it's 15 chapters, and to keep the experience fresh, I won't spoil anything. However, when you finish this said campaign, the freeplay options for the game are fantastic as well and are quite expansive. The game has a total of 155 unlockable characters (not including DLC) and even more unlockable vehicles to drive around the hub world with and other various collectibles to increase the playtime of the game. The aforementioned hub world is another amazing aspect of this game; they managed to recreate all of Manhattan perfectly into a LEGO environment, while simultaneously merging all the iconic Marvel locations within the said city. Stark Tower is just down the street from the Baxter Building, which is right next to Nightmare's Carnival, which is across the street from Fisk Tower, which is next to Oscorp... you get the idea. Pair this with the fully explorable Helicarrier that is used as the hub for all your collectibles, and you get one of, if the not the best hub world in any LEGO game IMO.

Overall, and you can say this is biased because of my nostalgia for the game, but I'd give LEGO Marvel Super Heroes a 10/10 when it comes to being an enjoyable, somewhat cartoony, and an overall wonderful game that's both entertaining for kids and anyone who enjoys LEGO games. I could be swayed into knocking the rating down to a 9.5 due to the porting issues, but if we're looking at the game alone, I consider it to be the best LEGO game ever released.

184894031.review: One of the best lego games out there.

184892417.review: The game is like corndogs. Fun in the center stick and pancakes

184877787.review: Humilde análise de alguém que acabou de platinar o jogo: Pra mim, o melhor jogo da Lego. Não comprei ele em promoções como outras pessoas, mas pra mim, os mais de 30 reais gastos valeram bastante a pena. O jogo tem boas mecênicas, não apresentou quase nenhum bug (além de alguns problemas com a câmera). Fases, tanto principais quanto extras, muito bem elaboradas e bem feitas, pra mim, todas perfeitas. Os personagens são em sua maioria bem únicos, com propriedades e habilidades exclusivas cada um; com alguns reaproveitamentos, é claro. Os minikits, obstinados e situações de perigo com Stan Lee são todas muito bem utilizadas, fazendo com que você queira continuar jogando e nem veja o tempo passar. As corridas para mim são muito boas, quase sem defeito algum. Inclusive um dos melhores sistemas do jogo são os Blocos Vermelhos do Deadpool (Deadpool Red Bricks), que são muito bem implementados nas fases extras, que como já mencionado, são excepcionais. Caso você queira jogar, mas esteja com medo de pagar caro em um jogo ruim, não se preocupe nem um pouco com isso; eu garanto que você não vai se arrepender (inclusive, o jogo é muito leve, oque para dispositivos mais fracos rodarem é muito bom. Meu notebook é um Acer Aspire Intel Core 3 sem placa de vídeo integrada e o jogo rodou muito liso com as configurações gráficas mais modestas. Na minha opinião, pra esse jogo, eu daria uma nota 100/10. Recomendo fortemente a todos.

184876359.review:
O jogo foi INCRÍVEL, mega nostálgico, isso durante a historia e as primeiras missões secundarias, quando terminei e tive a brilhante ideia de "platinar", MEU DEUS, Que INFERNO E FAZER ALGUMAS MISSÕES DESSE JOGO.
Mas super recomendo, ele não é difícil só tem algumas missões que são FRUSTRANTES.

184864463.review: this game is extremely outdated. but the charm is unmatched. fun with friends. 7/10

184588351.review: Good waste of a few hours, can be a bit annoying to get the last few gold bricks, but worth the struggle for the feeling of completion

184583629.review: Finally got around to finishing this one, and it's pretty great! It's classic LEGO puzzle solving and platforming with Marvel characters and the abilities they bring to the table. The story is about what you expect with the writing and humor being really juvenile and slapstick but there's something kinda great about a game that doesn't take itself seriously every once in a while. Overall i'd say wait until a sale since 20 USD is a bit much for an older LEGO game but other than that it's a great time for Marvel fans or people who love the old-school LEGO games.

184583518.review:
Esse é o primeiro LEGO que fiz 100%. Peguei em promoção pra lembrar da infância e CARA VALEU CADA SEGUNDO, QUE JOGO INCRÍVEL! Essa avaliação está sendo feita após a platina do game, espero que goste.

184525038.review:
This Lego game is near perfect if they make the flying control more proper in open world

Game itself so much fun with lots of side quest to play in open world, but again, why is every lego game release after 2010-ish just have like 10 to 15 main story level, man i missed when the game have lot more level. I want to spend more time in this game because it's so much fun.
Characters are variative and many of them are really fun to play with, even though some of them are recycle, like Beta Ray Bill from DLC, man lazy ass just throw Thor voiceline on him, i mean even Jean Dark Phoenix are better than him and that character just a recolor of original Phoenix + new fire beam.

9/10 would reccomend this game to other people, EXCELSIOR

184175207.review: Jogo muito bom! Nostálgico demais jogar Lego Marvel, lembra mt minha infância no Xbox 360

184167559.review:
Классная игрушка для тех лет, когда ее создали.
Я впервые начал играть в эту игру еще 6-7 лет назад, на XBOX 360, но потом про нее забыл. Сейчас же вспомнив о ней и о том какие классные воспоминания она мне доставила, решил ее купить.

В игре не сказать что крутой, но прикольный сюжет, много интересных персонажей. Здесь есть открытый мир, с кучей дополнительных заданий. Также, что мне очень нравится в этой игре, так это то, что в каждом уровне по ходу сюжета, встретив нового персонажа, игра добавит его в "коллекцию персонажей", затем уже в открытой игре можно будет использовать любого найденного героя из коллекции, опробовав его способности в мире. А еще здесь можно спавнить самолеты и яхты, чтобы кататься на них :D

В общем, рекомендую всем любителям MARVEL и не только. (Хоть я сам не являюсь особым любителям MARVEL, мне зашло)

8/10

184158823.review: I remember when i got this game in 2015, its was a pretty good game when i was a little kid.

184150666.review: Excelente juego muy entretenido y divertido es el tercero que platino al 100%. 3ro

184136549.review: Muito foda (o bruno disse que no teclado é ruim de jogar)

184069155.review:
Ola por meio desta resview vou contar como foi minha esxperiencia com esse jogo,

Bom tudo começõu quando eu vi este jogo em uma ótima promoção, e como eu joguei muito esse jogo vim dissidir compra-lo para matar minha nostagia, quando começei a jogar estava tudo uma maraviha me embrando de quando era criança e como eram bons tempos, e em poucas horas conseguir zerar, então depois de zerar eu me fiz o seguinte questionameno "Por que não patinar?" e foi ai que eu me arrependi profundamente como é um jogo em que seu grande publico eu pensei que seria facil de platinar e é mais MEU AMIGO TEM MUITO COLECIONAVEL NESSE JOGO E QUANDO DIGO MUITO É PORQUE SÃO 250 BLOCOS DORADOS 50 STAN LESS 11 BLOCOS DO DEADPOOL  150 MINIKITS E AINDA TEM QUE COMPRAR OS VEICULOS  EU PERDI TODA A MINHA SANIDADE NESSA PLATINA, eu joguei esse jogo POR 80 HORAS no meu caso eu jogei ele com algumas pausas para as nessecidades basicas e tbm algumas pausas com o jogo aberto no maximo essas pausas duravam 1 hora E AINDA EU MADRUGAVA FAZENDO A PLATINA DAS 10 OU 11 DA MANHÃ ATÉ 3 OU 4 DA MANHÃ (OBS: só tenho todo esse tempo livre por que sou estudante) em fim se vc não liga pra conquista ou esse meu textão aproveite o jogo e se você liga pra platina tenha uma boa sorte uma coluna e muita MAIS MUITA paciencia e muito tempo livre 

A e só quero deixar minha ultima reclamação desse jogo, POR QUE EM UMAS DAS MISSÕES A PORRA DE UM HEROI TEM QUE IR BUSCAR CAFE PRA UM CARA ALEATORIO.

183880270.review:
NOTE: It's recommended to play this game with an Xbox controller, or any controller that has the same control scheme. You do not need the DLCs to 100% the game and all of it's achievements.

Still a solid classic from my childhood. The plot is easy to understand for the young kids, but surprisingly deep and complex for adults that make it interestingly fun for family bonding and for all ages. I do recommend buying this game during a huge sale. There's zero point paying full price for a game like this, but it's up to you.

183735699.review:
One of my favorite lego games I have ever played.
Haven't played the entirety of this on Steam, but have had a Playstation and have completed the entirety, and must say, this is such a fun ride.
Although, I don't think this is the best Lego Marvel game, that goes to Lego Marvel Avengers, but I still love this game.
The boss fight(s) were excellent and Stan Lee and Deadpool were so fun to unlock.
9/10, only because some of the characters you can unlock are lackluster, but I would still recommend this to people who want a fun lego game.

183691882.review:
J'ai eu ce jeu quand j'étais enfant, à sa sortie, et j'y passais tout mon temps libre avec mon frère. Que de souvenirs ! Au point que ce soit l'un de mes jeux préférés sur la PS3, j'avais donc acheté la version PC pour revivre ces souvenirs. Appréciant beaucoup les licences Marvel et Lego, je ne pouvais que rêver d'un jeu comme celui-ci.

Si je peux vous assurer d'une chose, c'est que si vous aussi vous appréciez ces licences, ce jeu est réellement fait pour vous. Même après des années, il vieillit très bien. Certes, les missions secondaires sont parfois répétitives, mais elles ont un intérêt, notamment pour débloquer des niveaux secondaires. Par contre, l'histoire principale reste géniale, et les musiques du jeu, et encore plus celles des cinématiques, sont incroyables.

Si vous l'achetez pour vous ou pour un jeune, foncez. Ce jeu a fait partie de mon enfance, comme je l'ai dit précédemment, et m'a marqué au point de reprendre du plaisir à le terminer à 100% en 2024. Certes, sans mon frère cette fois-ci, mais les souvenirs et les moments passés restent éternels dans mon esprit.

183659578.review: This one of the less impressive Lego games, with characters often getting stuck with nothing to do, and it often being unclear where the heck you're supposed to go (particularly in New York City). Also, the music is highly derivative of the Avengers instead of being more original, and Wolverine is a terribly unimportant and unimpressive character unlike in the comics.

183571828.review:
Depois de muito tempo sem Experimentar esse Jogo eu finalmente joguei e zerei ele pela primeira vez, e ele é exatamente do jeito que eu lembrava e ate um pouco mais, Gráficos simples mas charmosos, gameplay dele é surreal de boa (se você tiver no controle, eu confesso que no teclado você vai peidar), a História não é uma super historia super fodona mas é melhor que qualquer filme da Fase 4 da Marvel,a trilha sonora pensei que seria o ponto mais fraco, mas na realidade eu achei muito boa, sem nenhum meme eu fiquei cantarolando a música da boss fight do magneto. e o fator replay é o ponto mais forte desse jogo, quando você zera o jogo ele ja mostra que concluiu apenas 20% do Jogo, e meu amigo, o tanto de coisa que tem pra fazer é enorme, jogar isso com meus 4 anos de idade foi mágico, e agora quase indo pra vida adulta, também foi, se você tem nostalgia por esse jogo ou gosta de jogos Lego no Geral, com certeza você vai gostar muito desse jogo
9/10 bem solido, recomendo pegar em promoções por que 7 reais nesse jogo ta mais barato que os CDs Piratas de Xbox 360 que vendem aqui
muito em breve postarei a analise com a Platina do Jogo
